item.title: HideOuts
item.description: The Problem Discovery of local culture can be difficult, especially if you are living in a new area or are travelling. HideOuts aims to provide a gamified way to find local places of interest and culture, thus making the process fun and interactive. The Pitch At the Fort Collins Startup Weekend, I gave the following pitch explaining core business concepts and customer development research findings: The MVP As the final project of my Mobile Development class in Spring 2020, I made a very early-stage prototype for HideOuts that demonstrated core ideas and basic functionality.
